text: ‫ؠ‬ I am very certain that measures could be taken ‫ؠ‬ I am quite certain that measures could be taken ‫ؠ‬ I am somewhat certain that measures could be taken ‫ؠ‬ I am doubtful that measures could be taken ‫ؠ‬ I am very certain that measures could NOT be taken 12. Do you think that YOU would be able to take protective measures against this new influenza virus if a worldwide pandemic were to occur (also in the Netherlands)?
